name: Super Mario Bros.: Peach's Adventure
overview: Princess Peach wakes up in Toad's House after he took her in to help her heal after he found her unconscious nearby. When she tries to go back to her castle, she finds out that, while she was gone, King Koopa has taken over her castle and kidnapped Mario! Peach decides to venture out to rescue Mario and stop Koopa! This is a SMW Romhack made by BWGlite and its development has been completed as of December 23rd, 2020.
